choices: Head up to bed. You’re exhausted
Go into the living room to watch your sisters play
Go into the kitchen to put away the shopping
1.content: It’s October 30th, the night before Halloween, you’re doing the usual preparations, you’re at the local supermarket buying Haribo and chocolate bars for any kids that might come knocking at your door, everything’s going as well as ever when you’re in a dead end job just trying to make ends meet. You notice a small elderly woman with white hair, wearing some long Floral patterned dress, she was trying to reach for something on a high shelf, you decide to be kind and help her out, you go to reach for the box of cereal she was straining for when out of nowhere she smacks your arm out of the way, confused you look down and see her cursing you out, stepping back you ask what’s wrong? Before she yells: ITS MY CEREAL. In shock you step away, baffled by the situation you struggle to find the words to respond and so decide it’s better to leave her be, as you turn around you being to mutter under your breath: what a crazy bit- but you’re cut off by her loudly chanting in some weird language you don’t recognise, freaked out by the woman you begin walking away at pace, as you leave you definitely hear your name mumbled by the woman once or twice, hoping she’s just a lunatic you pay for your sweets, get into your car and go home, on the way home you’re staring plainly off into the middle distance as the sun starts to set and the sky begins to turn a lovely shade of pink, you look up at the sky and marvel at it for a moment, but as you do you notice a small green flashing light in the distance, curious you lean forward to try and get a better look when you accidentally swerve and nearly clip another car, brought back to reality by a loud piercing beep from the other cars horn, pulling back into your lane you forget about the light and continue home. You walk through your door and nearly drop from exhaustion, the drive back was especially draining for some reason, you hear your step sisters playing video games in the front room and your step-mother in the kitchen blending another one of her energy super smoothies, you’ve got a big day ahead of you tomorrow, Halloween in your family has always been a bit of tradition, nothing ever goes well though, and honestly that’s part of the fun, after standing in the doorway for maybe a bit too long, you decide to:
1.title: A trip to the store

choices: Everything’s huge! You shrank to 1inch in your sleep!
You and every man on earth shrank overnight
Everything’s fine, must be your imagination
11.content:
You head upstairs, leaving the bags at the door, they’ll be fine until the morning you think to yourself trudging up the stairs. You barely make it to your room before you pass out onto the bed, fully clothed and fall straight asleep.
When you wake up, you don’t notice straight away but everything’s different somehow, what could it be?
11.title: The bedroom

113.content: you wake up feeling well rested sprawled out with the cover half off you like always, you’re lucky enough to have heating in your room so you don’t feel the cold, the rest of your day goes by as any normal Halloween would, you eat with your step mother and step sisters, play some family games with them, help put up decorations, then settle in for a nice night of movies and popcorn, you normally leave a bowl of treats out for kids so they don’t need to knock and interrupt the movies, as you’re walking with the bowl of sugary confections in one hand and the bowl of popcorn for your family in the other, you start to feel strange again, the same feeling from this morning, only much much stronger this time, your legs start to shake and in the blink of an eye, you’re falling through the sky, looking down you realise you’re headed right for..
113.title: Everything’s fine, must be your imagination

choices: One of the kids see you
1131.content: Looking down; you’re filled with dread as you’re plummeting towards the bowl of sweets you were just carrying! Millions of questions flooded your mind but only one mattered the most right now, how were you gonna survive this! Right as you thought your life was about to end, you brace for impact, the left side of your body impacts with something, then it gives and you fall slightly more, then you bounce slightly, bewildered you look around and survey your surroundings, you are in fact surrounded surrounded by giant sweets, chocolate bars the size of buildings and bags of Haribo bigger than you! You look down and see the worlds biggest flump, that was actually just a regular flump to anyone else, you say a little prayer of thanks to the giant marshmallowy god, your happiness is short lived though as you soon hear banging, coming seemingly from everywhere, you look around but all you can see is the blue walls of the plastic bowl you’re now trapped in, looking up however you see a huge pair of breasts hanging over you ominously, you recognise them immediately as your step mothers boobs, you can’t see her face over them, only the tip of her hair, you see it turn left and right as if looking around, then you hear in a booming voice: his friends must’ve come to pick him up. With this the bowl begins to shift and move, you lose your footing and fall deeper into the confectionary, you can still hear her voice echoing all around you: he could’ve at least let us know, or put this bowl out for the kids, I need to talk to that boy when I see him. With that you hear the creak of the front door opening, and suddenly, even at the bottom of all the chocolate and sweets, you feel the temperature drop significantly, she must be putting the bowl outside! Suddenly, the motion stops and everything is still again, you’re lucky it isn’t raining, otherwise this would be a lot harder to survive, you hear the front door slam again, then the only sound is that of the nocturnal creatures, you feel somewhat safe surrounded on all sides by familiar faces, there’s a snickers on your left, you fell onto a bag of haribo, and the rest of the space is being covered by a packet of chocolate buttons, you sit for a minute and think about how this could have happened to you. Eventually you narrow it down to the fact that it was either the green flashing light, that crazy woman at the store or something else completely unknown. The crazy woman seems the most logical, if logic is even something that exists anymore, she must’ve put some kind of curse on you, but that’s impossible, that’s all fantasy and make believe, you think to yourself sat only a few centimetres tall in a bowl full of sweets on Halloween night... You hear a group of children approaching the house, you hear them read the sign your mother always leaves out aloud: please take one and have a happy Halloween, they all say, you hear 4 female voices. Suddenly!:
1131.title: A twist of fate

choices: Try and stop Cindy from taking it all, but fail
Decide to put the bowl back where they found it
11311.content:
Typical you think to yourself, this had happened once or twice in previous years, a group of kids would steal the whole bowl for themselves, leaving all the other kids with nothing, it was selfish and mean, luckily it didn’t happen for the last few years, but it looks like the thieves were back. The worst part is that you all had a pretty good idea of who was behind the robbery, but couldn’t prove anything. And heading the four voices giggling above you as the bowl bounced and swayed, you feared you were right. Which is bad news.

Your fate Was sealed when you overheard one of the voices say: no Cindy, you’re not hogging them all to yourself like last time. Dammit. Dammit dammit dammit. You repeat to yourself, of all the entitled little brats to take the bowl your family kindly left out, it would have to be the group of spoiled rich brats that like in the wealthy part of town, They came in to your shop all the time and would always talk to yourself and other customers like they owned them, they acted so much better than everyone else.

last you saw them they were 16, but that was 2 years ago now, they went away on back to back holidays for 2 whole years with their parent money, surely they’re too old for trick or treating by now, the entitled spoiled little shits they are you were thinking to yourself, the girls were being obnoxiously loud as usual, they were chatting about all their travels and the different boys they fucked and all the strange expensive food they’d had.

The night dragged and dragged and dragged as you were routinely thrown between the girls, each being too lazy to carry the bowl for too long occasionally you would be pushed further down by more sweets being added to your prison, and sometimes the weight would become lighter as they took off a chocolate bar to eat or a packet of sweets to share, but mostly you sat and listened to the girls gossip and bicker all night.

By the end of the night, you’d memorised what had happened to each of the girls during their two year holidays: Cindy had gone away to Thailand to ‘find herself’ and fuck everything that moved. Alexis had gone to Egypt to take in the culture, and all of Egypt’s food. Jeniffer went to Japan for their ‘deep honourable culture’ but mostly because she heard they did foot massages and the power trip was amazing to her. And Stephanie went to South Africa to ‘get the most amazing tan’ but really it was to be the richest and most powerful person in a 50 mile radius. you couldn't care less and honestly wanted them to put you out of your misery at this point. Be careful what you wish for, suddenly the girls all start saying their goodbyes, before deciding how to split their spoils for the night. Do they
11311.title: They take the whole bowl

113111.content: The girls decide to split their earnings between, with each girl getting approximately 30 pieces/bars/bags each, but to stop someone from picking all of their favourites they decided the best way was a free for all of who can grab what they wanted before the others, over hearing this you realise your stood on a snickers bar, full sized aswell! That’s cindy’s favourite, but the others could just as easily be going for it to annoy her, realise you were stood on the prize of the lot, you try to dive off the gigantic chocolate bar but before you get a chance to, a giant pair of fingers wrap around you and the bar, trapping you too it, retracting quickly, you don’t get a chance to look at who grabbed you before being stuffed into a bag, then more and more chocolate is piled on top of you, trapping you even more in your bag prison. The girls say their goodbyes and each head home. Who’s bag were you in?
113111.title: a free fall like never before

choices: Leave them and go to the toilet
12.content: You leave the bags by the kitchen door and head into the living room to see your sisters, they’re playing assassins creed multiplayer, you suck at it but they play it enough to actually be pretty good, you sit down on the couch next to them, you sink much further than expected, you didn’t realise how much your sisters weighed the couch down, your sisters are by no means small women, there’s your little sister Emma who’s 17 years old, she’s 5”11, c cup and wearing large yoga pants that are stretched to their limit, shes by no means fat though, she’s worked for her body and it shows. She has a sadistic streak in her and often enjoys toying with you when playing games, you also swear you’ve seen her putting bugs into her underwear but she’d always deny it. Your older sister Suzy is 24 she’s 6”2 her tank top barely containing her FF cup and her 28”waist jeans with her thighs threatening to snap the threads In her ripped jeans, she used to be as active as your younger sister but recently started working out less and eating more so a little fat started to form, but she still looked great. Suzy was always the more caring one and would look after you when you were sick, but she was also known as the slut of her year, and you once went into her room and found an extensive collection of sex toys, ones you hadn’t even heard of. You can’t help but admire them as you sit down, they’re your step sisters with no blood relation, is what you tell yourself to make it feel less perverted, you say: hi guys, what ya playing? only to be met with complaining from both of them telling you to leave, you’re a bit of a back seat gamer and it can annoy them quite a bit, do you:
12.title: Go into the living room to watch your sisters play

choices: Suzy looking down at you, worried
Emma’s ass coming straight for you!
122.content: You say you’ll happily leave if they can beat you at a round of the assassins creed pvp, but if you win, they have to be your servants for the whole Halloween day, they argue that it’s not an even bet, so you agree that if you lose, you’ll be their servant for the whole day instead, they agree, after two rounds of tied gameplay, it all comes down to this, you’re blending in to a crowd and spot your older sister accidentally sprint for a second, you make your way towards her, thinking about what you were gonna make them do as your servants for the whole day, gleefully you prepare to pounce! Suddenly everything goes black, you sit there in darkness for what feels like forever, dazed and confused you try to move and thrash around, to open your mouth and screams anything, but you simply can’t, you’re stuck in what feels like a sensory deprivation tank, but without the water, after a while of, well nothingness, you feel movement from all around you, a surreal experience, like you’re flying through the air, then a bright light washes over you like the pearly gates of heaven opening before you, looking upwards you see
122.title: Challenge them to a round, 2v1

choices: The living room on a couch
1221.content:
You look skyward and the heavenly light is replaced, you squint to see emmas face grinning down at you with glee, Infact her face is all you can see, it fully engulfs your vision.

Well. This is it. I died and went to hell, probably for all of the terrible thoughts you had about your new family members, worth it. You think to yourself

‘Hey.. react.. scream.. something?’ Your sisters voice booms from all around you, peering up into the vast sky space you realise you have just been stood motionless, dazed as you attempt to process and come to terms with what’s happening, this must be hell, right?

Suddenly, the vast expanse of Emma’s face disappears before you, replaced by a hand the size of a planet reaching down, you begin to cower but the hand doesn’t come straight for you, instead it reaches slightly to your left, about 300 meters away, 3cm to the giantess, and suddenly the ground beneath you starts to move and you fall over onto your back, but the grounds soft?? You don’t have time to think as quickly a rush of motions happens, again feeling like your flying, but horizontally this time as you roll across the acres of ground you’re trapped on, then everything around you stops moving, but you go flying into an opening of the black abyss you’re trapped in, flying out of the arm hole in your previously tight fitting black shirt, light once again fills your vision, and the ground is softer than ever out here, dazed you try and look around as your eyes adjust to the light, you’re in
1221.title: Emma smiling down at you

12211.content:
With your vision slowly returning, you realise you’re now in emmas bedroom, you recognise it straight away, having spent much time in here annoying your sister, blinking aggressively with pain in your eyes you see the looming shape of her bed pillows just in front of you, they the size of mountains compared to you!
Turning around you see your step sister Emma stood looking at your thrown shirt, lazily drooping on the edge of her bed, She slowly starts taking her own shirt off, you sit there, unable to move on her continent sized bed, staring up in amazement at your gorgeous sister undressing before you, showing off her expensive lingerie that she would always moan for and complain to her mother, your mother until she bought them for her, she span around and grabbed the waistband of her yoga pants, slowly tugging at them, revealing her black lace thong, she always wore thongs with her yoga pants as they wouldn’t show as much because her yoga pants could barely contain her voluptuous curves, bending slightly to fully remove her pants, her cheeks don’t even begin to part because of their humongous size, they were so shapely because of her constant working out, she really was proud of her body, and showing it off wasn’t uncommon, but never like this! Staring in amazement, you begin thinking to yourself, wait, did Emma shrink me to this height? How did this happen? What’s going on? What is she going to do to me? A million questions raced through your mind, you just hoped you could get answers from if not her, maybe someone would know what happened to you, and if there was a way to fix it.. returning your attention to the behemoth obstacle Before you, she begins using one hand to gently lift your t-shirt, while the other hand reaches down the side of the bed, pulling it back she reveals
12211.title: Emma’s bedroom

123.content:
You say: fine fine, I’ll leave you to your game, you big nerds, enjoyyyyyy. And you leave the room, just as you do, you feel a sudden turn in your stomach, suddenly you need to use the bathroom. Now! You start sprinting towards the bathroom at the end of the hallway, you just make it in time, you think you’re going to throw up, you spin around to close the door, no time to lock it; gonna -

A moment passes, then another, and another, you didn’t throw up, nothing happened actually, and nothings still happening, not nothing in the usual sense, this time, literally nothing is happening, there’s silence, everything’s black, there’s just nothing, the only thing you can sense is an almighty pressure on all sides, covering you completely, it’s warm, comforting and it smells nice, suddenly all the comfort it ripped away from you in one cruel motion, I guess this isn’t heaven you think, dazzled by a bright light you look around, you’re... on the edge of the toilet seat, but wait, you’re standing? What’s that in front of...... EMMA?! You’re stepsister is right in front of you, or to be more specific, her knees are right in front of you, and they’re the size of buildings. Looking upwards you see her looking down, holding your regular sized clothes in hand, her perfectly manicured pink nails gripping them with annoyance, she says: why does he always leave his clothes lying around when he gets changed, I hate him. Her voice booms over you almost causing you to lose your balance, you look down and keep your footing, you realise you’re naked?! Sure you should’ve realised sooner, she is holding the clothes you were wearing, you head a crash as she tosses your clothes aside, looking back towards the now goddess sized sister, you panic as she begins to tug at her yoga pants and panties simultaneously,, she shimmy’s them down her shapely perfect ass and thighs, wiggling from side to side, not one bit of her thickness jiggles, you were entranced, you stare up and your step sister, now wearing only a tight fitting top, she begins to pivot on the spot, her gargantuan ass staring you in the face, almost threatening you, a rush of adrenaline courses through you, your body knows it’s do or die, out of sheer instinct you:
123.title: Leave them and go to the toilet

choices: Stay perfectly still and hope it stops
Climb onto the counter before you get too small
13.content: You lumber into the kitchen, your step-mother, dressed casually in slides and leggings with a loose fitting top doesn’t hear you as you put the shopping on the counter top, her blender whirring away as you look over and notice her whole body jiggle as the machine sends ripples through her body, particularly you’re drawn to her ass, it was just huge, your step sisters clearly had good jeans because this is where they were getting it for sure, you stare fixedly on her ass as you watch each tiny movement. You start to get hard, panicking and trying to cover it with one of the shopping bags before she turned around, you realise you can’t lift the bag, now you can’t reach it! A quick glance around the room confirms it, everything’s getting bigger?! Wait no, nothings getting bigger, well something is, you’re getting smaller! Panicking again you start to look around frantically for somewhere to go, something to do, you don’t know what, just anything!
13.title: Go into the kitchen to put away the shopping

choices: Hang on tight and hope for the best
131.content: You use every bit of energy you have to sprint towards your now towering mother in law, you realise that the previously short distance keeps growing and growing and growing until what was once and inch becomes a mile, and once a slide now becomes a 50ft wall of a black monolith, you’ve shrunk to less than an inch tall! And now you’re at the base of your mothers casual shoe, you crane your neck back to look up at the scale of the Goddess that was once slightly shorter than you. Staring up into the sky you see her head spin to look at where you once were, she looks confused as she sees bags of shopping left on the side, concluding her step son must have left them there to go up to bed, she begins to make her way over to them to see what the bags contain, down below however, a simple movement across the kitchen is like the earth itself is splitting apart as this huge wall of black begins to lift from the ground and into the sky. Do you:
131.title: Run towards your step-mother

1312.content: Your titanic mother in law began to raise her slide covered sole from the ground, she then slammed it back down with great force a few meters from you, Inches for her, then the other foot, then the first foot again, staring up at the giantesses form you notice she has headphones in and has begun lazily dancing, moving back and forth, her feet barely missing you each time, each slam is like two tectonic plates colliding for you, whereas she is more focused on her music, you spend a while dodging her feet as she enjoys herself, at one point she nearly brings her right foot down on top of you, but you just manage to roll out of the way in time, the edge of the slide barely missing you, this time the shockwave sends you flying into the sky a little bit, you start trying to make your way away from her and her destructive disco, you start running for the door that leads out to the hall, it’s a clear run with nothing between you and safety, then her foot lands in what can you can only assume is an explosive end to whatever song she’s listening to, directly in front of you, with a bang that if you were normal sized, would be heard around the world, her foot slaps down right in front of you, even at your size, only inches away from you, with this colossal movement, the shockwave sent into the ground was enough to send you flying up into the air, and straight into her
1312.title: Stay perfectly still

1313.content: As the gigantic wall raises infront if you, you become overwhelmed by the whole situation, you panic more than you ever have in your entire life, you scream and start running in the opposite direction of the now hovering shoe, as you sprint with everything you’ve got in you, all of your senses become a little sharper, you know this because it’s what caused you to begin smelling that horrific smell, it was a mix of rotten egg and sweat, the smell was so intoxicating you tripped and with full force, smashed face first into the ground beneath you, luckily it wasn’t as crippling as you’d first assumed. You’d managed to make it to the carpet in the hall, but you could still smell that horrid stench burning the inside of your nostrils, you notice the area around you darken asif a huge cloud we’re blocking out the sun, then you remember your situation, looking up you see the planet sized underside of your mothers foot, she must be going to check on your step sisters, you remember that she only wears her slides when she’s in the kitchen, and as a result, her now bare foot was headed straight for your tiny frail body, to any ant sized ears, your life was ended with a wailing scream, an earth shattering bang, and then silence, to human ears, it was simply the sound of a single step of a caring mother
1313.title: Run away from her

info.brief_description: Was is the gypsy curse? The green light? Doesnt matter You’re shrunk Good luck surviving
info.description: Please add! This is my first addition here, feel free to add lots, you’re Ryan, a nice guy who’s just trying to get out of his dead end job, it’s October 30th and you’re enjoying a Halloween with your family, but not everything is as it seems, somethings going on inside Ryan, hopefully he’ll be able to survive his step-sisters Emma and Suzy and his step mother Alice, this won’t be a treat filled Halloween, or will it?
